item.description:
Hi Packers,

Not the way we wanted to begin the season with a though opening loss, all be it to a very good team, but at least the turn out was great for the first game, it is great to see many old faces and lots of new ones. This week we have a short turnaround with playing the Bears on Thursday, we will have the game on both floors but if you could please RSVP in the next few days so we can organize staff for the game. We have had a lot of interest from Packers fans who will be in town for the game so hopefully we will have another big crowd. As usual any ideas or suggestions are welcome, have a great week and see you on Thursday.

Go Pack

Ray Butler

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Packers v Bears
